summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to reduce the assessment on a certain tract of land at the corner of Woodland Park Avenue and Ewing Street, levied for the improvement of Woodland Park Avenue, by grading and sidewalking the same, as provided for in Ordinacne No. 9630, creating Local Improvement District No. 759, and appropriating money therefor, also authorizing and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to draw a warrant in favor of the payor of said assessment in the amount of excess paid by said payor.
